detectors.description:
Math.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#17-20) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#18)
Pilnette.constructor(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#130-133) ignores return value by initSetting(comany,totalSupply_) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#132)

Pilnette.withdrawTokens(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#135-138) ignores return value by tc.transfer(owner_,tc.balanceOf(this)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#137)

Pilnette.initSetting(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#140-144) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances_[addr] = amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#141)
detectors.markdown:
[Pilnette.initSetting(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#L140-L144) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances_[addr] = amount](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#L141)

detectors.description:
Pilnette.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#146-148) shadows:
	- ERC20Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#77-85)

Pilnette.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#150-152) shadows:
	- ERC20Token.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#89-99)

Math.div(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#12-15) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- c = a / b (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#13)

[Math.div(uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#L12-L15) may have integer overflow

detectors.description: Pragma version^0.4.24 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#1) allows old versions
solc-0.4.25 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description: Constant Pilnette.comany (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#128) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#47-51)

lock(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.lock(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#53-55)

unlock(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.unlock(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#57-59)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Token.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#75)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#87)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#101-105)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#107-109)

burn(uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Token.burn(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pilnette.sol#111-117)
